      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Work - Word Knowledge 2</string>
            <string language="en">Work - Word Knowledge 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Arbeit - Wort-Wissen 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Travail - La Connaissance 2 De Mot</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Trabalho - Conhecimento 2 Da Palavra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lavoro - Conoscenza 2 Di Parola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εργασία - γνώση 2 του Word</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Trabajo - Conocimiento 2 De la Palabra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">In this exercise you can check if you have learned and understood the words in the previous exercise, Work - Word Knowledge 1.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 6 - What Would You Like?</string>
            <string language="en">In this exercise you can check if you have learned and understood the words in the previous exercise, Work - Word Knowledge 1. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 6 - What Would You Like?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">school</string>
            <string language="sv">work</string>
            <string language="sv">professions</string>
            <string language="sv">occupations</string>
            <string language="sv">word knowledge</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">school</string>
            <string language="en">work</string>
            <string language="en">professions</string>
            <string language="en">occupations</string>
            <string language="en">word knowledge</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Übung können Sie überprüfen, ob Sie 
die Wörter in der vorhergehenden Übung erlernt und verstanden haben,
Arbeit - fassen Sie Wissen 1 ab. Safir - Englisch und 
Berufsleben für Anfänger - Modul 6 - was wurden Sie mögen?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cet exercice vous pouvez contrôler si vous 
avez appris et avez compris les mots dans l'exercice précédent, 
travail - exprimez la connaissance 1. Safir - l'anglais et vie 
active pour des débutants - module 6 - que aimez-vous ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Neste exercício você pode verificar se você 
aprender e compreender as palavras no exercício precedente, trabalho 
- exprima o conhecimento 1. Safir - vida do inglês e de 
funcionamento para novatos - módulo 6 - que  você gosta?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa esercitazione potete controllare se 
avete imparato e capite le parole nell'esercitazione precedente, 
lavoro - esprima la conoscenza 1. Safir - inglese e vita attiva 
per i principianti - modulo 6 - che cosa gradite?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την άσκηση εσείς μπορεί να ελέγξει εάν 
έχετε μάθει και έχετε καταλάβει τις λέξεις στην προηγούμενη 
άσκηση, εργασία - γνώση 1. του Word αγγλική και οικονομικά 
ενεργή ζωή Safir - για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 6 - τι θα 
θέλατε;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En este ejercicio usted puede controlar si usted 
ha aprendido y ha entendido las palabras en el ejercicio anterior, 
trabajo - redacte el conocimiento 1. ¿Safir - inglés y vida 
laboral para los principiantes - módulo 6 - qué  usted tiene gusto?</string>
          </description>
